data.message: Hello Facebook... How do I get help with my account when I can't even login?  For the last 24 hours it says "YOUR ACCOUNT IS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE DUE TO A SITE ISSUE. WE EXPECT THIS TO BE RESOLVED SHORTLY. PLEASE TRY AGAIN IN A FEW MINUTES"  The account ID  is https://www.facebook.com/cheryl.marshall.9026

replies.message: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Cheryl. Do you mind reporting this issue in the Help Center if you're still experiencing it? http://on.fb.me/XEpvtM Thanks much. -Leigh
You're not alone.  I can't get facebook on my phone any more.  Same message.

it's not always 100% of the time helpful HOWEVER, Fb's Help Center has helped us a few times & it worked out. So, I have to say that's not entirely true. I guess it depends on what you are actually seeking help for.... :)
